name: Pawn Sacrifice (Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype of a Roguelike videogame made for my Degree's Final Project, it is unfinished but the core ideas are in the game, enjoy it!

The idea of the game is to advance in a dungeon where when you finish a level you have to sacrifice a character to obtain one of their powers, doing this you can get to the final boss with a mixed combination of abilities to defeat him.

There are 4 characters that you can play and each one of them have different abilities. Also the dungeon changes in every game so it's never the same!

Controls:

W, A, S, D -> Movement

Mouse -> Look at

LEFT Mouse -> Attack

Shoutout to 0x72, from who I got most part of the art in the game
